item.title: Flake Changed Python Files Only On PR
item.description: Have you ever needed to run linting or Flake8 only on specific Python files during build validation checks on Pull Requests (PRs) in Azure DevOps? In certain situations, such as implementing Flake8 on a pre-existing large-scale project, you may only want to enforce Flake8 checks on the modified files in a PR.
